After a 24-h culture in serum-free conditions and stimuli as indicated in the figures , <extra_id_0> luciferase <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> activity was measured by the dual <extra_id_0> luciferase <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> assay system ( Promega ) according to the manufacturer 's instructions .
